title: Toxic Flask
summaries: The Toxic Flask is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that has a 2.5*1/40 (2.5%) / 4.94*79/1600 (4.94%) chance to be dropped by Dr. Man Fly during the Solar Eclipse event. It throws a flask with low velocity and a heavy arc that explodes on impact and creates a spread of small toxic clouds that constantly damage enemies. The clouds last for one to two seconds.

statistics.Sell: 10 GC
